name: Star Platinum! 2D Shooter
description:
Star Platinum! is a 2D Shooter developed in the Michigan State University Game Design and Development course on Coursera.  

NOTE: for some reason, the WebGL build does not have sound. But other builds do have sound.

Changes:

  1. Added health bar.
  2. Added new UI assets.
  3. Added a second level with an infinite sidescrolling game mode.
  4. Changed the first level to be a bullet hell.

Game assets source: https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-space-shooter-game-gui/

Created by Nuno Barbosa
